^[a-z]{2}-[A-Z]{2}$.description: Translation key/value pairs. Keys are [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 compliant language tags](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Language_localisation#Language_tags_and_codes) (for example: ``en-GB``, ``nl-NL``). Values are the localized descriptions of the return question.

example.en-GB: What size would you like in return?
